title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 and KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled. However, they do not have any effect when moved. This issue is especially noticeable when opening small images like icons, as the scrollbars are misleading and do not provide any functionality.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Launch the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Open a small image, such as an icon.
3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled but do not have any effect when moved.
